error.20: An account already exist with this email.
error.30: The mail provider was ban because to many robots are doning automatic registers.
error.40: Your password isn't enough strong. Add some alpha, numeric and special chars.
error.50: The sent mail address is not valid.
error.60: Any account exists with this mail. Please, register!
error.delete-account-password-invalid: Account was not deleted, because of non-valid password
error.update-email-server-error: Email update failed, because of a communication error with our server.
error.profile-password-invalid-password: Password submitted invalid! Your password had not been updated.
error.profile-server-error: Your profile was not updated because of a communication error with our server.
error.update-address-failed: Geolocation data has not been updated.

activation.label: Activation code
activation.helpBlock: You can find activation in the mail sent just after your registration.

profile-account.description: Here you can delete your account. To do it, enter your password and press the submit button. Be careful, this deletion will be definitive. After you press the button, your account will be deleted and you will be definitively disconnected.

latitude.label: Latitude
latitude.helpBlock: Drag and drop the marker to change location.

longitude.label: Longitude
longitude.helpBlock: Drag and drop the marker to change location.

password.label: Password
password.helpBlock: For security reason, please enter your password.

confirmation.label: Confirmation
confirmation.helpBlock: Confirm your password. Password and confirmation fields should be equals.

confirmation.label: Confirmation
confirmation.helpBlock: Confirm your password, password and confirmation fields should be equals.

read.label: I read and accept Terms of Service.

help.activation: To activate your account, please enter the activation code provided in our mail.

delete-account.title: Are you sure to delete your account?
delete-account.message: Be careful, your account will be DELETED, this cannot be undone. After you accpet, your account will be deleted and you will be logout.

help.profile-address: This form helps you to enter location data, like city, country. You could drag and drop marker to alter your position.
help.profile-email: Complete this form to change your email. An email with an activation code will be set to the new email to confirm it. A mail to your old address will be sent to cancel update.
help.forgot-your-password: You have forgotten your password? Please send us your email, you will receive a mail which will help you step by step to recover your accesses.
help.register: Please, complete this form and read Terms of services to register.
help.profile-password: Complete this form to replace your password by a new one.
help.profile: This form allow you to update your profile. Update data, then click on "Save" button.

link.forgot-your-password-title: Go to our form which will help you to create a new one.

message.404-explanation: The requested page doesn't more exists.

activation.10: Your account is activated, you can now login.

forgot-your-password.10: A mail to update your password have been sent. Please, check your mailbox.
forgot-your-password.20: A temporary password has been sent by mail. Please, check your mailbox.
forgot-your-password.30: Administrators have been informed, they will contact you by mail as soon as possible.

message.logout-successful-explanations: Your disconnection has been logged. Hope to see you soon!
message.password-confirmed: Your password and its confirmation match.
message.please-login: To unlock access to this page, please login.

profile.profile-updated: Your profile has been successfully updated.

profile-address.success: Your address has been successfully updated.

profile-password.success: Your password has been successfully updated.

register.10: You can login to the website.
register.20: An administrator will activate your account. You will be alert by a mail when it will be done.
register.30: To verify your mail address, we have sent a mail with a link. Click it to finalize your registration.

update-email.success: An email has been sent to new address, please follow instructions to finish this update.

description.forgotten-password: This process help you to recover your forgotten password.
description.tos: Integral content of usage general conditions.

description.part1: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.
description.part2: Switch language between english and german using buttons above.
